About Me

I am a Full-Stack / Back-End Developer. I am currently working at Kuadran Technologies as a Full-Stack Developer. I have 3 years of working experience in designing, developing, testing, and maintaining over 30 software applications for dekstop, web and mobile.

DMS - Delivery Management System

Concrete delivery management application. This application facilitates business processes such as receiving concrete orders from customers - delivery scheduling, report generation, commission calculation, delivery and questionnaire calculation and etc.

This application runs on a windows desktop, using a connection to an online PostgreSQL database.
I joined the team for developing this application, have maintained, and added many features such as new reports, commission calculations, sending questionnaires. I deal directly with users to collect requriement, modify database, design feature, development, and publish.

Desktop C# PosgreSQL Maintain Add Feature

Portal GRC

Portal GRC is web-based application and mobile application that accommodate information and automate processes in the GRC department. This web application features Changes Management Form Online, Product catalogs, Mailing System, E-library, Document requests and permissions, Reporting creation and automation, and SOP management.

This web application is made using C# with asp net core framework. This website contacts the web API which is in charge of processing the PostgreSQL database. The web API can also be accessed from the mobile application from xamarin which is made as a helper for this web application.
I am responsible to develop the app from the design document and requirements given. design and create DB and publishing the app to a server.

Website C# ASP Net Core PosgreSQL Design DB & System Develop Publish

BiShare

Applications used for entrepreneurship development. This application is to accommodate entrepreneurs for business matching and pitching, business exhibitions, business promotions, buying and selling products and services, accommodating the results of commercialized PBL products. This mobile application is made using a Javascript framework for mobile react native, Expo. it uses a firebase database for data storage. this is very useful for the chat feature.

I am responsible to develop the app from the requirements given. create a design document, and create DB.

College Project Mobile Javascript React Native Firebase Realtime database Design DB & System Develop
